scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=packages/game-core && npm run test --workspace=packages/game-web
scripts.mobile:sync: npm run build:web && npm run sync --workspace=apps/mobile
scripts.mobile:build:android: npm run build:web && npm run sync --workspace=apps/mobile && echo 'Open android/ in Android Studio and build release APK'
scripts.mobile:build:ios: npm run build:web && npm run sync --workspace=apps/mobile && echo 'Open ios/ in Xcode and archive for distribution'
scripts.dev:desktop: npm run build:web && npm run dev --workspace=apps/desktop
scripts.build:desktop: npm run build:web && npm run build --workspace=apps/desktop
scripts.package:desktop: npm run build:desktop && npm run package --workspace=apps/desktop
